com.seagate.csp.gui.conn

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seagate.csp.gui.conn.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpirationListener, Destroyable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExpirationListener, Destroyable
    Code is confined to AWT event thread. All calls *must* be issued from AWT event thread. State diagram: +---------------------------------+ +----------->| DISCONNECTED, connection = null |-----------------+ | +---------------------------------+ <---------- + | connect() | disconnect() | | | | V +-----------------------------------+ +-------------------------------+ | DISCONNECTING, connection != null | | CONNECTING, connection = null | +-----------------------------------+ +-------------------------------+ ^ | | disconnect() | doInBackground() | +-------------------------------+ | +-------------| CONNECTED, connection != null |<---------------+ +-------------------------------+ Events are fired on every state transition.
